articles.title: Samsung Confirms Galaxy S25 Ultra Release Dates
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung's community anticipates the release of the new Galaxy S25 Ultra. Speculation surrounds the opening of pre-orders and the arrival of the new OneUI-powered Android flagship.

articles.title: Hot off the Heels of a Next-Gen Xbox Rumor, Microsoft Announces Your LG Smart TV Is Now an Xbox
articles.author: Shaun Cichacki
articles.summary: Microsoft's Xbox Cloud Gaming service will soon be available on new LG Smart TVs. Users will be able to connect an Xbox controller via Bluetooth to play games directly on their LG TVs. This service will be available later this year.

articles.title: LG UNVEILS A DAY IN A LIFE WITH "AFFECTIONATE INTELLIGENCE" AT LG WORLD PREMIERE
articles.author: LG Electronics
articles.summary: LG Electronics unveiled its vision for AI-powered customer experiences themed "Life's Good 24/7 with Affectionate Intelligence" at the LG World Premiere event during CES 2025. This showcases the company's direction in integrating AI into its product offerings.

articles.title: Robot Vacuums Now Have Legs
articles.author: John Werner
articles.summary: Dreame company is unveiling the Dreame X50 Ultra. It is a new model of robot vacuum, featuring small legs for navigating inclines and lidar for mapping spaces. The Dreame X50 Ultra also incorporates enhanced suction for deep cleaning pet hair.

articles.title: The Galaxy S25 series launches January 22, and Samsung is already offering discounts
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung is set to reveal its Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22nd. A pre-order deal offers a $50 credit towards the new Galaxy S series phone and potential trade-in credit up to $900 for eligible devices. The Galaxy S25 series is rumored to feature a rounded design, Snapdragon 8 Elite, and camera upgrades.

articles.title: Bye, XPS: Dell has renamed all of its laptops and desktops to confuse you
articles.author: Dan Grabham
articles.summary: Dell is rebranding its XPS laptop line and introducing new product names. The consumer laptops will be known as Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max. The company confirmed various Intel-based devices at CES 2025, including the Dell Pro 13 and 14 Premium series and Dell Pro Max 14 and 16.

articles.title: Mirumi: A furry, babylike robot to steal hearts at CES 2025
articles.author: Jijo Malayil
articles.summary: Yukai Engineering will introduce two new products at CES 2025: Mirumi, a robot designed to mimic the interactions of a human baby, and Nékojita FuFu, a portable robot that cools hot drinks and food for people with heat-sensitive tongues. Mirumi uses sensors to detect and engage with nearby people and objects, while Nékojita FuFu utilizes an internal fan and 'Fu-ing System' to cool items effectively.

articles.title: In Today's Digital Age a Strong Online Presence is a MUST for Success
articles.summary: WSI, a global digital marketing solutions provider, offers customized services including search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, and social media marketing. These services aim to enhance online visibility, customer engagement, and overall digital marketing effectiveness for businesses of all sizes.

articles.title: Samsung claims its Ballie AI robot will actually be released this year
articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.summary: Samsung plans to ship Ballie, a rolling robot, to consumers sometime in 2025. Ballie, first introduced at CES five years ago, has undergone a redesign. The robot can interact with users via voice and projects information onto surfaces.

articles.title: CES Unveiled 2025: Jizai's Mi-Mo is a walking stool that waved at me
articles.author: Haley Henschel
articles.summary: Jizai, a Japanese robotics company, debuted Mi-Mo, a customizable general-purpose AI robot, at the Consumer Electronics Show. The robot, described as a combination of furniture and a mutant toy, was presented at the Unveiled media event.

articles.title: Lisa's Things, Places and Events/ Yamaha Innovation Road Corporate Museum: Amazing insight into Yamaha's corporate heritage, culture
articles.summary: Yamaha Innovation Road Corporate Museum features Real Sound Viewing, an innovative technology offering multi-sensory experience of music. This technology allows audiences to experience music visually and audibly, even remotely.

articles.title: Alpha Modus Secures 9th AI Patent, Strengthening Leadership in Retail Innovation  Jan. 6, 2025 22:00
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: Alpha Modus Holdings, Inc. has been issued its 9th patent for 'Methods for Personalized Marketing and Advertising'. This AI-driven innovation aims to deliver real-time, tailored marketing and advertising experiences, addressing the demand for personalized consumer engagement in the retail market. Alpha Modus intends to leverage this patent to enhance the in-store digital experience.

articles.title: TCL Unveils Next-Gen NXTPAPER 4.0 Display Technology at CES 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: TCL has launched several new products including the TCL NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet, featuring AI-enabled eye comfort modes, and the TCL 60 XE NXTPAPER 5G smartphone, which includes an Eye Care Assistant. Also, TCL introduces the TCL K32 smartphone, which offers a cost-effective way for more consumers to experience the benefits of 5G connectivity. Furthermore, TCL unveils the new NXTPAPER 4.0 display technology that improves display clarity and sharpness.

articles.title: New Bird Buddy smart garden products let you peek into the secret lives of pollinators
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Bird Buddy introduced two new products, Petal and Wonder, at CES 2025. Petal is a solar-powered camera with changeable lenses designed to capture nature. Wonder is the brand name for the new products.

articles.title: Samsung claims its Ballie AI robot will actually be released this year
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Samsung's Ballie, a rolling robot, is scheduled to ship to consumers in the first half of 2025. This release marks Ballie's transition from demonstration prototype to a commercially available product.

articles.title: Starbucks is adding these menu items to compete in the value wars
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing new items, including the return of a popular favorite. The items are a recent development as Starbucks continues to evolve.

articles.title: Narwal S20 Pro review: This wet-dry vac is the best investment I've made in my cleaning routine
articles.author: Alex Temblador
articles.summary: Narwal has launched the S20 Pro Vacuum Mop, a second-generation upright wet-dry vacuum featuring five cleaning modes, including a smart dirt-detecting mode. The Narwal S20 Pro distinguishes itself with excellent edge cleaning and a self-cleaning and drying system; however, it does not perform well when vacuuming in reverse.

articles.title: A2Z Drone Delivery launches multi-use BVLOS drone dock network
articles.summary: A2Z Drone Delivery launched a multi-use drone dock network featuring autonomous patrol, water rescue support, and regional retail delivery. Partnering with the Anji Bureau of Water Resources, the network uses A2Z AirDock and Longtail UAV platform and supports patrol and food deliveries.

articles.title: Google Takes A Big Step Into User-Driven Agents With Agentspace
articles.author: Jason Andersen
articles.summary: Google has launched Agentspace, a no-code environment designed for business users to create productivity-focused AI agents. Agentspace extends Google's NotebookLM and includes features like third-party integrations and team space sharing. Google also announced a preview of a new tool called Jules.

articles.title: CES 2025 LIVE: Sony unveils its latest devices in Las Vegas
articles.summary: Sony will unveil its latest consumer devices at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. This event is expected to showcase advancements and gadgets in various tech sectors.

articles.title: Walmart's bestselling $160 nightstand is on sale for only $29, and buyers say it's 'perfectly priced and sized'
articles.author: Adam Reeder
articles.summary: Walmart offers a significant discount of 82% on one of its bestselling nightstands. This promotional deal aims to make the useful piece of furniture more accessible to customers.

articles.title: Splash Car Wash Opens Its 66th Location, An Express Site in Henrietta, NY
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Splash Car Wash opened its 66th location in Henrietta, New York. The new car wash features a 130-foot conveyor and 27 free self-service vacuums. Another new location is under construction in Hamburg, New York, expected to open next month.

articles.title: Dreame's X50 robot vacuum can climb stairs
articles.author: Karissa Bell
articles.summary: Dreame is launching its X50 robot vacuum in the US at CES 2025, featuring stair-climbing capabilities up to 6cm. Pre-orders for the X50 open on January 7, and it will be available on Amazon and Dreame's website on February 14.

articles.title: TCL Launches New TCL 60 XE NXTPAPER 5G Smartphone
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TCL has launched the TCL 60 XE NXTPAPER 5G smartphone featuring NXTPAPER technology and the NXTPAPER Key for enhanced eye comfort, available in Canada from May 2025 starting at $199. TCL also introduced the TCL K32 smartphone, an entry-level 5G option priced under $100, available in the US from September 2025.

articles.title: All Dreams in One Dreame: Dreame Technology Unveils Next-Generation Smart Home Ecosystem at CES 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched a suite of new products at CES 2025, including the X50 Ultra robot vacuum (available February 14th for $1699.99), the Z1 Pro robotic pool cleaner (available in March for $1,599.99), the H12 Pro FlexReach Wet & Dry vacuum (available in February for $449), the Z30 Cordless Stick Vacuum (available February 21st for $499.99), and the Airstyle Pro hair styling tool (available in May for $399). These products showcase innovative technology aimed at simplifying home care and enhancing daily living.

articles.title: This robot vacuum has legs
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Dreame is launching the Dreame X50 Ultra robot vacuum, featuring 'motorized swing arms' that act as legs, allowing it to navigate steps up to 6cm. The X50 Ultra, a successor to the X40 Ultra, includes oscillating mopping pads, obstacle recognition, lidar navigation, and a multifunction charging dock. It will be available for $1,699.99 starting February 14th, with a presale on January 7th.

articles.title: All Dreams in One Dreame: Dreame Technology Unveils Next-Generation Smart Home Ecosystem at CES 2025
articles.author: Dreame Technology
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched its next generation of smart home cleaning products at CES 2025. The product suite includes the X50 Ultra robot vacuum, Z1 Pro Robotic Pool Cleaner, H12 Pro FlexReach Wet & Dry Vacuum, Z30 Cordless Stick Vacuum, and Airstyle Pro hair tool.

articles.title: TCL Announces Latest Advancements to Proprietary NXTPAPER Technology and Brings NXTPAPER 4.0 to Life with TCL NXTPAPER 11 Plus Tablet
articles.summary: TCL announced its latest NXTPAPER 4.0 technology and the TCL NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet at CES 2025. The NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet brings the new generation of NXTPAPER display technology to life, optimized for human eyes, and prioritizing healthy habits.

articles.title: Food made without plants or animals will go on sale in the US in 2025
articles.summary: Savor is preparing to launch synthetic vegan fat products, including butter and chocolate, in select US restaurants in 2025 after FDA approval. Solar Foods is introducing Solein, a protein powder, also targeting US restaurants and food services after FDA clearance; Solein is already available in Singapore.

articles.title: Switchbot's new renter-friendly smart lock can be retrofitted onto almost any door
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the SwitchBot Lock Ultra, a smart lock compatible with most door types and unlockable in 16 ways, including fingerprint, smartphone app, NFC card, and voice command. SwitchBot has also launched a smart doorbell designed for seniors.

articles.title: Well, It Looks Like It's ‘Prime' Time for a New Xbox, According to a Prominent Leaker
articles.summary: Rumors suggest Microsoft may be planning to announce a new Xbox console, possibly called 'Xbox Prime,' in 2026. There's also speculation about Microsoft developing an Xbox handheld device. The company is possibly 'Prime'-ing up for the announcement of this new product.

articles.title: TCL announces the NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet at CES 2025, featuring a new nano-etched display
articles.author: Amy Skorheim
articles.summary: TCL is showcasing its NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet featuring the new NXTPAPER 4.0 screen at CES 2025. This tablet includes an AI-powered Smart Eye Comfort Mode and features like Google's Circle to Search, Smart Voice Memo, and a Smart Translator. Pricing and availability are forthcoming.

articles.title: TCL announces the NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet at CES 2025, featuring a new nano-etched display
articles.author: Amy Skorheim
articles.summary: TCL is showcasing the NXTPAPER 11 Plus tablet at CES 2025, featuring the new NXTPAPER 4.0 screen with improved clarity, sharpness, and color accuracy. The tablet includes AI-powered Smart Eye Comfort Mode for optimized viewing and supports features like Google's Circle to Search, Smart Voice Memo, Smart Translator, and AI Subtitles. Pricing and availability for the NXTPAPER 11 Plus are still forthcoming.

articles.title: Momcozy Launches Its Registry System to Support Moms from Pregnancy to Parenting
articles.summary: Momcozy is launching the Momcozy Registry System in January 2025, an all-in-one solution for moms to create personalized registries. Momcozy also presents the Grow Together Collection, featuring eight essential products like Wearable Breast Pumps, Baby Monitor, Sound Machine, High Chair, Baby Stroller, and Bottle Washer.

articles.title: ‘Max Ink Mode' makes TCL's screens even inkier
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: TCL is launching the TCL 60 XE phone, featuring a 6.8-inch display with Max Ink Mode, a 50-megapixel rear camera, and 256GB of storage, priced at $199 and launching in Canada in May 2025. Additionally, TCL will launch the Nxtpaper 11 Plus tablet with Nxtpaper 4.0 technology and the Playcube projector, with pricing and availability details to be announced later.

articles.title: Revolutionize Your Marketing Campaigns with AI-Generated Flyers
articles.summary: Dreamina introduces an AI-powered platform for creating professional marketing flyers with features like an image generator and customization options. The platform enables businesses to design flyers for event promotion, product launches, and seasonal campaigns, and it also offers tools like a business card generator for cohesive branding. With Dreamina, businesses can quickly design and customize visually appealing flyers, logos, and business cards, ensuring brand consistency and saving time and resources.

articles.title: This HD folding projector fits in your pocket
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Aurzen unveiled the Aurzen ZIP at CES 2025, a tri-fold portable projector capable of projecting a 720p image. The ZIP has a 5,000mAh battery, USB Type-C charging, and wireless HDMI dongle support, with a Kickstarter campaign planned for funding.

articles.title: The Role of AI in Web Design: How Artificial Intelligence is Shaping User Experiences
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: AI is transforming web design with tools like Wix, Bookmark, Adobe Sensei, and Designhill's AI logo maker. These platforms offer automated website creation, personalized user experiences, and design suggestions. AI integration helps businesses establish a swift online presence, improve user engagement, and make data-driven decisions, enhancing overall design efficiency and user satisfaction.

articles.title: Olymel unveils new brand image
articles.summary: Olymel is rebranding its products with a new logo, developed in collaboration with LG2, featuring red and blue colors. This new identity will be implemented across all physical and digital brand touchpoints, including packaging, advertising, and signage. The rebranding aims to highlight product quality and reflect the company's transformation and growth.

articles.title: Instacart brings Carrot Ads to food distributors, operators, manufacturers
articles.author: Timothy Inklebarger
articles.summary: Instacart has partnered with Cut+Dry to integrate its Carrot Ads into the Cut+Dry e-commerce platform. This allows food manufacturers to connect with end buyers, while also opening new revenue opportunities for distributors and operators in the foodservice industry. Carrot Ads will be available to brands on Cut+Dry over the next few quarters.

articles.title: xTool Debuts New AI Platform at CES 2025, Showcases Tools to Simplify Creative Process
articles.author: XTL US INC
articles.summary: xTool will debut at CES 2025 showcasing its products and technologies. Leading the lineup is AI Make, xTool's innovative software platform. Attendees can explore xTool's latest offerings, including the M1 Ultra, F1 Ultra and the P2S.

articles.title: These 'ridiculous, but useful' mop slippers make cleaning easy — get 5 sets for $15
articles.author: Anne Mandler
articles.summary: Aifusi has introduced Mop Slippers, reusable cleaning slippers made of chenille and elastic. They can be used directly on floors, attached to mops, or even used on Swiffers. The Aifusi Mop Slippers are machine washable, dry quickly, and are being sold on Amazon.

articles.title: 10 Most Successful Shark Tank Products USA That Made Millions
articles.author: Kenneth
articles.summary: Several companies featured on Shark Tank USA successfully launched innovative products. Bombas, a comfort-focused socks brand with a charitable aspect, received $200,000 and achieved $1.3 billion in lifetime sales. Scrub Daddy, specializing in cleaning products, secured $200,000 and made $209 million in sales. Similarly, Squatty Potty, Simply Fit Board, The Comfy and many other companies launched innovative products and secured investments to achieve significant sales.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'wonderful' $50 handheld vacuum for just $19, and shoppers say it's 'portable yet powerful'
articles.author: Victoria Garcia
articles.summary: iFanze has launched its Cordless Handheld Vacuum, now available at Walmart for $19. The portable vacuum features 6,000-pascal suction power, a 120-watt motor, and a 900-milliliter dust container. It includes accessories like a HEPA filter, USB charging cable, brush tool, extension hose, and crevice tool, and is powered by a 2,600-milliampere-hour battery.

articles.title: Niu Technologies Provides Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Sales Volume Update  Jan. 6, 2025 17:00
articles.summary: NIU Technologies successfully launched new electric vehicle models throughout 2024, achieving substantial year-over-year growth in both China and international markets. New models, including the N-Play, NX, NT, FX, and UMAX, catered to diverse consumer segments. The company also unveiled innovative products like dirt bikes and advanced micro-mobility solutions at EICMA.

articles.title: Royal Caribbean adds alternative to Deluxe Beverage Package
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A cruise line introduced a surprising new offer, presenting a beverage package alternative to attract fans.

articles.title: This hydrating shampoo and conditioner set has been named the BEST by thousands for strengthening damaged hair (and it's 30% off)
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Coco & Eve is offering discounts on several products including the Like A Virgin Shampoo & Conditioner Bundle Kit, now priced at £25.20, featuring ResistHyal™ Hyaluronic Acid for increased hydration. Additionally, the new Coco & Eve Like a Virgin Clarifying Detox Shampoo is introduced to remove hard water impurities.  The Coco & Eve Sunny Honey Bali Bronzing Foam is available in multiple shades promising a sun-kissed glow and hydration.

articles.title: Datasea Announces Entry into Agreements that Will Place its Acoustic High-Tech Products in a Total of 263 Beauty Stores in Northern China
articles.author: Pr Newswire
org: Tianjin Chuangfukang Consulting Service Co., Ltd.
articles.summary: Datasea Inc. has partnered with 14 beauty industry service and management companies to place its acoustic high-tech products in approximately 263 beauty salons and body care stores in northern China. These agreements are expected to drive sales of the Company's acoustic high-tech products to over $11.0 million in 2025. Datasea plans to expand its customer channel to up to 10,000 beauty and body care stores within 2-5 years.

articles.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R launch in India: How to watch ‘Winter Launch Event' online, what to expect and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its OnePlus 13 series in India. The company is teasing the launch with a 'Winter Launch Event' on social media.

articles.title: Essential tools to make the modern web more bearable January 6, 2025 7:04 AM Subscribe
articles.summary: Several tools and extensions are highlighted for enhancing the internet experience.  FB Purity is mentioned for customizing Facebook feeds, Privacy Badger by the Electronic Frontier Foundation is recommended for privacy, Consent-O-Matic automates cookie consent, Unhook addresses YouTube usage, SocialFocus aids in digital detox, and Cookie Autodelete manages website-stored data.

articles.title: Samsung unveiled our dream TV at CES 2025 with AI and cameras
articles.summary: Samsung introduced its 2025 smart TV lineup at CES 2025, featuring Vision AI technology and updates to Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED models, and The Frame TVs. The new TVs include features like Live Translate for real-time subtitle translations and Generative Wallpaper for personalized art canvases. Samsung is also expanding access to its Art Store to the Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, and QLED models.

articles.title: LG's new tiny home van concept is a tech bro's dream on wheels
articles.author: Grace Snelling
articles.summary: LG Electronics revealed the 'Lifestyle Solution for Mobility,' a smart home-enabled van prototype. This van showcases LG's Mobility Experience (MX) platform, designed to integrate mobility and AI Home technology as a subscription service. The prototype will be on display at CES 2025, exhibiting features like smart home appliances and voice-activated AI assistant.

articles.title: CES 2025 is here. What can we expect from the annual show of all-thing tech?
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: CES 2025 featured the unveiling of several new products. LG showcased its gram 2-in-1 convertible laptop. Mustard introduced its new consumer line of AI smart glasses. Other innovations included LiberLive's stringless guitar, Kirin's Electric Salt spoon, E-SKIMO's electrical assisted e-ski mountaineering device, Lili's reading light and monitor for dyslexia, and Bosch's Revol Intelligent Crib.

articles.title: CES 2025 is here. What can we expect from the annual show of all-thing tech?
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: CES 2025 featured the unveiling of several new products. LG showcased its gram 2-in-1 convertible laptop, while Mustard introduced AI smart glasses. Other innovations included LiberLive's stringless guitar, Kirin Electric Salt spoon, E-SKIMO's e-ski mountaineering device, Lili's reading light and monitor for dyslexia, and Bosch's Revol Intelligent Crib.

articles.title: CES 2025 is here. What can we expect from the annual show of all-thing tech?
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: CES 2025 showcases new product introductions. LG features its Gram 2-in-1 convertible laptop, Mustard unveils AI smart glasses, LiberLive presents its stringless guitar, Kirin showcases an electric salt spoon, E-SKIMO highlights an electrical-assisted e-ski mountaineering device, Lili unveils a reading light and monitor for people with dyslexia, and Bosch features the Revol Intelligent Crib. PC companies will also likely introduce new AI-powered products.

articles.title: Avataar debuts Velocity, an AI tool that generates product videos based on a product link, and says HP, Victoria's Secret, Lowe's, and others are using the tool (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Avataar has launched Velocity, an AI tool that generates product videos using a product link. Companies like HP, Victoria's Secret, and Lowe's are currently utilizing Velocity.

articles.title: Cut+Dry and Instacart Announce New Partnership to Boost Ad Reach in Foodservice
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cut+Dry and Instacart have partnered to integrate Instacart's Carrot Ads technology into Cut+Dry's platform, creating a large advertising platform for the foodservice industry. This collaboration allows food manufacturers to connect with buyers and provides distributors with new revenue opportunities through digital advertising. The integration of Carrot Ads on Cut+Dry will be available in the coming quarters.

articles.title: NEW YEAR, NEW LOOK: TÖST NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DEBUTS NEW CAN FORMAT
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TÖST Beverages has launched its signature sparkling beverages in 250ml cans, available in Original and Rosé flavors. The new cans are designed for on-the-go consumption and are currently available on the brand's website and will be rolling out to retailers nationwide throughout 2025.

articles.title: Albertsons Companies Hosts 3rd Annual Competition for Emerging and Innovative Food, Beverage and Pet Products
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Albertsons Companies launched its 3rd Annual Innovation Launchpad competition. The competition targets emerging brands in the food, beverage, and pet product sectors with net retail sales between $3 million and $10 million. The live competition will be held at the Natural Products Expo West in Anaheim, California, on March 4.

articles.title: WhatsApp users can now make AI images: Here's How
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: WhatsApp has introduced a new feature allowing users to generate AI-created images directly within the app. Users can create images by typing '@Meta AI imagine me' followed by a description. The generated images can be reviewed, modified through revised prompts, and then saved or shared.

articles.title: Niu Technologies Zooms Ahead: Q4 Sales Volume Soar 65% As New Models Electrify The Market
articles.author: Lekha Gupta
articles.summary: Niu Technologies experienced a 65% year-over-year sales growth in the fourth quarter, driven by the successful introduction of new e-motorcycles, e-mopeds, e-bikes, and kick-scooters. These newly launched models constituted over 70% of the quarterly sales. Furthermore, Niu Technologies launched a nationwide direct-to-consumer (D2C) sales platform for its off-road and on-road dirt bikes, the XQi3 Wild and XQi3 Street.

articles.title: Council Post: How Amazon Sellers Can Use AI To Streamline Listings And Operations
articles.author: Mina Elias
articles.summary: AI tools are beneficial for Amazon sellers. AI helps in crafting product descriptions, analyzing competitors, generating images, automating customer support, and trend analysis. AI tools boosted ad performance.

articles.title: Mynd.ai's Promethean Brand to Release its Most Unified ActivPanel™ Experience yet with the Introduction of the ActivPanel 10 and Promethean ActivSuite™
articles.author: Mynd.ai
articles.summary: Promethean, a subsidiary of Mynd.ai, Inc., has launched its new ActivPanel 10 and Promethean ActivSuite, a unified interactive flat panel display and software solution. The ActivPanel 10 and Promethean ActivSuite solution is designed to offer freedom of choice, simplicity, and adaptability, allowing users to choose their preferred operating system.

articles.title: New AI Vacuum: The Robot With An Arm That Picks Up After You
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Roborock Saros Z70, a new robotic vacuum cleaner featuring an AI-powered robotic arm to pick up debris. The Saros Z70 can lift and relocate small items up to 300 grams and is slated for release in major global markets in the first half of the year.

articles.title: NextGen Digital Evaluates Expanded Opportunities Within Data Hosting & Cloud Computing  Jan. 6, 2025 13:00
articles.summary: NextGen Digital Platforms Inc. plans to expand its Cloud AI Hosting division to offer scalable and cost-efficient data hosting solutions to meet the global demand. This expansion aims to deliver enhanced offerings tailored to various industries and enterprises by leveraging NextGen's existing platform and expertise. The company aims to redefine value in the digital infrastructure sector.

articles.title: The Best Dry Shampoos for Dark Hair of 2025: Reviewed
articles.author: Israel Hayom Shopping Team
articles.summary: The article reviews several dry shampoos designed for dark hair. These dry shampoos absorb oil, eliminate odors, and refresh hair without leaving a white residue. They often include benefits such as UV protection, color-safe formulas, and ingredients like oat milk and vitamin C.

articles.title: Primark's new £3.50 'Sol de Janeiro' perfumes fans say they 'need'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Primark has introduced five new exotic body mist sprays, each 100ml, for £3.50 a bottle. These fragrances, with tropical names like Fiji Fiesta and Bali Blush, are designed for on-the-go use and are available in local Primark shops. The scents include combinations like Apple and Coconut for Fiji and Pear and Amber for Rio.

articles.title: Samsung unveils smart TVs with AI translation features
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its new Samsung Vision AI smart TVs at CES 2025. The new smart TVs provide instant translation to users during live broadcasts in seven languages. The TVs feature options like 'Click to Search', 'Live Translate', and 'Generative Wallpaper', and incorporate Microsoft Copilot.

articles.title: Glossier's new Black Cherry collection is here, and we tried everything
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: Glossier launched its Black Cherry Collection featuring new versions of Balm Dotcom, Cloud Paint, No. 1 Pencil, and Lip Line. The collection includes a deep-red tint across its iconic products, offering a mature take on the original cherry shade. Reviewers praise the pigmented flush of the Cloud Paint, the smooth application of the Lip Line, and the versatility of the No. 1 Pencil.

articles.title: (CES 2025) Samsung Electronics unveils new AI-powered QLED TV
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced its 2025 Neo QLED 8K TV at CES 2025, featuring the NQ8 AI Gen 3 processor for enhanced 8K upscaling and the Eclipsa Audio technology developed with Google for immersive 3D sound. The new TV also incorporates Vision AI, offering personalized viewing experiences, content recommendations, and real-time subtitle translation, while integrating Microsoft Copilot for personalized content recommendations.

articles.title: How Sex-Toy Pioneer Alexandra Fine Gets It Done
articles.author: Lux Alptraum
articles.summary: Dame Products, led by Alexandra Fine, focuses on developing and selling sleek sex-tech products. The company, after a successful crowdfunding campaign, faces challenges in securing investors and navigating advertising restrictions due to the nature of its products.

articles.title: AI means the end of internet search as we've known it
articles.author: Mat Honan
articles.summary: Google introduced AI Overviews, leveraging its Gemini language model and Knowledge Graph to generate concise summaries for search queries. OpenAI integrated web search into ChatGPT, enabling the model to provide up-to-date information and generate multimedia-rich responses. Both companies are innovating with AI to improve search experiences, offering capabilities such as summarizing content and providing real-time information.

articles.title: Moto G05 Launch Tomorrow in India, Will Run on Android 15; Check Expected Price, Features and Specifications
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G05 smartphone in India on January 7, 2025. The Moto G05 features a 6.67-inch display with a possible 90Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme processor, and Android 15 OS. It will be available in Plum Red and Forest Green on Flipkart and leading retail stores.

articles.title: Magical garden Rose 'Abracadabra' will leave gardeners spellbound
articles.author: Lindsey Fur
articles.summary: You Garden introduces Rose 'Abracadabra', a unique bush rose with varied blooms of velvet red petals streaked in yellow, available for purchase. The rose is priced at £17.49, a saving from the RRP of £22.49, with additional postage and offer code details provided.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G05 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Moto G05 smartphone on December 17, 2024. This budget smartphone features a 5200 mAh battery with 18W wired charging and is available in multiple colors. It is powered by a Mediatek Helio G81 Extreme processor and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers rush to stores for kitchen appliance dupe €160 cheaper than original
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano Air Fryer, available in two sizes: a 6.2-litre model for €49.99 and a 3.3-litre model for €34.99. The air fryers feature multiple preset programs and offer a healthier and faster cooking alternative.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50 Pro: Comprehensive Review of Features, Specs, and Performance
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 50 Pro, a mid-range smartphone featuring a sleek design, a 6.7-inch pOLED 144Hz display, and a versatile triple-camera setup with a 50MP main camera. The phone also boasts 125W TurboPower charging and runs on Android 14 with Motorola’s MyUX skin.

articles.title: This Water Bottle Cap Is Like a Personal SodaStream You Can Take on the Go. It Sparkles
articles.author: Jon Reed
articles.summary: Roam introduces the SodaTop, a handheld device similar to SodaStream, designed to carbonate water directly in a bottle. The SodaTop uses a CO2 cartridge within its cap to transform still water into sparkling water, offering a portable carbonation solution. Roam also sells compatible water bottles.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50: A Game-Changer in the Mid-Range Smartphone Market
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: Motorola has released the Edge 50, a mid-range smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 888 chipset, a 64MP primary camera with OIS, and a 6.55-inch 120Hz AMOLED display. The device offers 30W fast charging and runs on Android 14 with Motorola's My UX interface, priced at approximately $499.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'small but mighty' dehumidifier stops mould and 'looks cool'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Dunelm is selling the Russell Hobbs Fresh Air Mini Compact Dehumidifier, which aims to reduce humidity and minimize dampness. Amazon offers the Newthinking Mini Electric Dehumidifier, while Debenhams features the Neo Portable Compact Dehumidifier on sale.

articles.title: (CES 2025) LG Electronics unveils new AI-powered OLED TV
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: LG Electronics has introduced its 2025 OLED evo TV, featuring an AI-powered OLED screen with brightness booster technology that enhances image quality. The new model is equipped with the Alpha 11 AI processor and LG's webOS, delivering higher resolution and an improved user experience. It also includes premium features for gaming and movie enthusiasts.

articles.title: The art of product integration: Android's '#DeletedScenes' ft. Ananya Panday
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Android launched the #DeletedScenes campaign, integrating its features like Circle to Search and Gemini into content with a Bollywood star. The campaign showcases Android's capabilities in real-life scenarios from the series "Call Me Bae" to engage Gen Z. The campaign also contains videos where the star switches to Android.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils ‘Samsung Vision AI' Platform and Innovative Tech at First Look 2025 Event Ahead of CES on January 7, Showcases New TVs and Interactive Displays
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its "Samsung Vision AI" platform at the First Look 2025 event, prior to CES 2025. The company showcased new products including the 2025 Neo QLED 8K, the 85-inch Neo QLED 4K, the 83-inch OLED TVs, and The Premiere 5 interactive display.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Launch: Major Durability Upgrade and Key Features Revealed
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13 globally on January 7, 2025, featuring IP68 and IP69 durability ratings, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a Hasselblad-tuned triple-camera system. The phone has a 6.82-inch LTPO AMOLED display and a 6000mAh battery with 100W fast charging and will be priced under ₹70,000 in India.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'compact and quiet' £49 dehumidifier prevents mould problems
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Dunelm is selling the Russell Hobbs Fresh Air Mini Compact Dehumidifier for £49, praised for reducing humidity in small spaces. Alternatives such as the Newthinking Mini Electric Dehumidifier on Amazon and the Neo Portable Compact Dehumidifier on Debenhams are also available. Customer reviews highlight both positive and negative experiences with the Russell Hobbs dehumidifier.

articles.title: Supermarket launches biggest ever deals event with 1,000 items at £1 or less
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: Iceland Foods launched its 'Mega Deals' event on January 3, featuring an expanded range of products in its '£1 or less' line and various promotional offers. These include '10 for £10' deals, 'Buy 2, Get 1 Free' offers on cupboard essentials, and 'Half Price' discounts on frozen foods and laundry products. The event encompasses both food and household items and will run until January 20.

articles.title: Magnolia Soap and Bath Co. turns out to be the new party place
articles.author: Carrie Rengers
articles.summary: Magnolia Soap and Bath Co. has opened a new store at the Village at Greenwich. The store's top sellers include soap, shower oil, sugar scrub, and body butter, with laundry wash expected to gain popularity. They also offer a party space where guests can create their own soap, bath bombs, and candles.

articles.title: 21 Chic Target Products That Will Make People Think You Hired An Interior Designer
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Target is offering a diverse range of new home decor and kitchen products. These include a three-piece luxe glass bath bundle, a Papier recipe journal, a wing arm accent chair, mushroom stool, a 2-in-1 table and desk fan, soft double-brushed sheets, an outdoor egg chair, Rifle Paper Co. insect prints, a Victrola Bluetooth record player, cotton dishcloth sponges, an Our Place ceramic nonstick Always pan, an Acacia wood cutting board, a cheerful coir-blend doormat, a weighted knit blanket, a curved wooden bookcase, a floral table runner, a macrame light filtering velvet curtain, an elegant shower curtain, and an acrylic desktop organizer.

articles.title: N-one NPad Mini Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: The N-one NPad Mini, a new tablet, features an 8-inch IPS TFT display, an Allwinner A523 Octa-core processor, 4GB RAM, and 64GB of internal storage, expandable up to 1TB. It is equipped with a 5MP rear camera with LED flash and a 5MP front camera, and runs on Android 11+, upgradable to Android 14, with a starting price of P4,084.68.

articles.title: MG returns to South Africa: A legacy of performance ignited
articles.author: Matthys Ferreira
articles.summary: MG is launching in South Africa with 25 dealerships, introducing vehicles tailored to local preferences. The brand is showcasing its MG ZS subcompact SUV, MG HS mid-sized SUV, and the MG Cyberster electric roadster, all designed with fun driving, vigorous design, and high-tech features.

articles.title: First Direct is offering Brits free £175 to switch current accounts - how to get it
articles.author: Graeme Brown
articles.summary: First Direct is reintroducing a £175 cash offer for new customers who switch to its 1st Account, with certain conditions. Nationwide offers a similar £175 switching bonus, while Santander provides £150. The Co-operative Bank offers up to £150 for switching customers, also with certain conditions.

articles.title: Niu Technologies Provides Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Sales Volume Update
articles.author: NIU Technologies
articles.summary: Niu Technologies launched new models in 2024, including N-Play, NX, NT, FX, and UMAX targeting Gen Z riders, resulting in a 65% year-over-year growth in China. At EICMA, Niu unveiled innovative products like dirt bikes, electric motorcycles, and micro-mobility solutions. Overseas, the micro-mobility segment delivered exceptional performance, achieving a 65% year-over-year growth in Q4 and a 57% increase for the full year.

articles.title: Schlotzsky's in Murfreesboro Hosting Grand Opening
articles.author: Andrea Hinds
articles.summary: Schlotzsky's Murfreesboro is hosting a grand opening event on January 16th, featuring a $2.99 promotional offer for small "The Originals" sandwiches. The first 100 guests purchasing a 4-pack of Cinnabon will receive a free in-app "Buy One Entrée, Get One On Us" offer for 52 weeks.

articles.title: Step by step guide to create AI images on WhatsApp
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Meta AI, integrated within WhatsApp, introduces a new service enabling users to create AI-generated images directly within the messaging app. Users provide a text description, and Meta AI generates an image based on the prompt, which can be modified and saved or shared.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Vision AI and New Innovations at First Look 2025
articles.author: K S Krishna
articles.summary: Samsung introduced Vision AI, delivering personalized AI-powered screen experiences, and unveiled the Neo QLED 8K QN990F TV featuring the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor for enhanced picture and sound.  Samsung also launched The Frame Pro with Neo QLED picture quality and the Premiere 5, an interactive triple-laser ultra-short-throw projector, expanding its range of innovative display technologies.

articles.title: Lazada's AI-Powered 12.12 All Out Sale Generated US$483 Million in Savings for Shoppers in Southeast Asia
articles.author: PR Wire
articles.summary: Lazada announced the success of its 12.12 All Out Sale, driven by the launch of its new GenAI in-app features. These features include AI Lazzie, a personal shopping assistant, Smart Recommendations, AI-Generated Product Information, and AI-Generated Models to enhance the shopping experience. The campaign saw significant engagement, with a 76% increase in unique visitors and 6 million AI engagements.

articles.title: Crystal Services Announces Advanced Hygiene Cleaning Solutions for London Offices
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Innovative Office Cleaning launched in London and London Central UK, offering cleaning services for offices. The company provides daily, weekly, and monthly cleaning packages, deep cleaning, carpet cleaning, and window cleaning, using eco-friendly and non-toxic products.

articles.title: Eufy Omni S1 Pro review: more for daily duties than a deep cleaner
articles.summary: Eufy has launched the Omni S1 Pro, a premium robot vacuum and mop with a self-cleaning base station. This all-in-one system features ozonated water for hygienic mopping, a self-drying mop dock, and precise navigation via LiDAR and a 3D MatrixEye sensor. The Omni S1 Pro excels at mopping hard floors and offers customizable cleaning schedules through a mobile app, although its vacuuming performance on carpets could be improved.

articles.title: The second-gen Kindle Scribe is on sale for the first time
articles.author: Cheyenne MacDonald
articles.summary: Amazon is offering its first sale on the 2024 Kindle Scribe, reducing the price of the 64GB model by 19% to $365. The latest generation Kindle Scribe features tweaked appearance, added AI features, and new note-taking options.

articles.title: LG's OLED evo TVs for 2025 come with AI and a 165Hz refresh rate
articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.summary: LG is introducing its OLED evo TV lineup for 2025, featuring the α (Alpha) 11 AI processor Gen2 for improved image quality. These TVs offer 4K resolution with a 165Hz refresh rate, certified by NVIDIA G-SYNC and AMD FreeSync Premium, and include upgraded Brightness Booster Ultimate technology, achieving three times higher brightness than conventional OLED models.

articles.title: #CES2025: Samsung brings anti-glare screens to flagship Mini LED TVs
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its 2025 TV lineup with anti-glare screens and advanced AI at CES in Las Vegas. The company is expanding its matte, glare-free display technology, initially featured on the S95D OLED model, to include flagship Mini LED sets designed to minimize reflections.

articles.title: I tried a ‘magic mirror' that reveals where I'm going wrong with skincare – and it'll save me money too
articles.author: Assistant Technology
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the MICRO LED Beauty Mirror, an AI-powered device that analyzes skin and recommends products, initially from Amorepacific. L'Oreal unveiled the Cell BioPrint, a portable device that analyzes skin samples to provide insights into aging and cosmetic ingredient responsiveness. The products aim to personalize skincare and reduce trial-and-error in purchasing decisions.

articles.title: I tried a ‘magic mirror' that reveals where I'm going wrong with skincare – and it'll save me money too
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Samsung introduced its MICRO LED Beauty Mirror at CES 2025. This mirror uses AI to analyze skin for wrinkles, pores, redness, and melanin and then suggests skincare products based on the analysis, initially recommending products by Amorepacific, such as Innisfree's Green Tea Seed Hyaluronic Cream.

articles.title: Chinese tech firms flood into Korea
articles.author: Park Jae-hyuk
articles.summary: Xiaomi Technology Korea is set to unveil new products like smartphones and televisions at a press conference on January 15. BYD is scheduled to release its passenger car in Korea on January 16, after establishing a sales network. Roborock opened its second Korean flagship store on January 1.

articles.title: Your LG TV can't match this very smart upgrade that's coming to UK homes soon
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: LG is launching its 2025 OLED evo lineup, including the OLED evo M5 and G5 models. These TVs feature an α (Alpha) 11 AI processor Gen21, brighter visuals, and AI-driven personalization. The OLED evo M5 is the world's first true wireless OLED TV, offering a clutter-free setup.

articles.title: Tackle Wellness Goals by Adding a Touch of Green: Better-for-you recipes inspired by savory salad kits
articles.summary: Fresh Express introduces the Twisted Creamy Truffle Caesar Chopped Salad Kit, featuring crunchy garlic brioche croutons, romaine lettuce, truffle Parmesan cheese, and creamy dressing. Additionally, Fresh Express suggests using their Sweet & Crunchy Salad Blend in a Grilled Zucchini Nachos recipe.

articles.title: Harness Power and Productivity with Cutting-Edge Laptops
articles.summary: Laptops powered by the Snapdragon X Series are being introduced, boasting features like multi-day battery life, unmatched performance, and on-device AI capabilities. These laptops offer fast processing power, power efficiency, enhanced security, and simple device management for business and personal tasks.

articles.title: Magical garden Rose 'Abracadabra' will leave gardeners spellbound
articles.author: Lindsey Fur
articles.summary: You Garden introduces the new Rose 'Abracadabra,' a bush rose with unique velvet red petals streaked in yellow, offering varied blooms and a summertime aroma. It is available for purchase through You Garden at a discounted price of £17.49 (RRP £22.49) with item code 530316.

articles.title: Telegram introduces third-party verification, NFT gifts
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Telegram introduced third-party account verification, enabling organizations to authenticate accounts. Additionally, users can now create NFT gifts with custom backgrounds and icons using Telegram Stars. Furthermore, the platform has enhanced message search filters for private chats, group chats, and channels.

articles.title: Latest Innovations at First Look 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung introduced Vision AI technology at CES 2025, which is integrated into its Neo QLED, OLED, and QLED models. Samsung also unveiled the Neo QLED 8K QN990F TV featuring the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor, The Frame Pro with Neo QLED technology, and The Premiere 5 interactive projector. These new products and technologies aim to deliver personalized and immersive entertainment experiences.

articles.title: Evolving beyond Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) turning a finished product into a perfect product
articles.author: Niyi Kolade
articles.summary: Amazon initially launched as a bookstore to test the e-commerce market. Uber began as an iPhone-only SMS service called UberCab to refine the user experience. Spotify started as a landing page to test streaming technology and attract investors, which has increased customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Monday Motivation: The perks of reflection and daily me-time
articles.author: Shail Desai
articles.summary: Spinny, founded by Niraj Singh in 2015, facilitates the buying and selling of used cars. Singh aims to offer customers a satisfying experience in the used car market by building a brand around trust and experience.

articles.title: Roborock Unveils AI-Powered Robotic Arm for Their Chinese Robot Vacuum Cleaner
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Roborock has revealed its new robot vacuum cleaner, the Saros Z70, featuring an AI-powered folding arm for obstacle removal, scheduled for global release in the first half of the year. Additionally, Roborock announced updates to its washing machines, which now include clothes drying functionality within the same unit.

articles.title: 43 Vertical Storage Solutions If That's The Only Space You've Got Left
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new organizing products available on Amazon, including a shower curtain liner with storage pockets, adjustable mug organizers, and fridge door organizers, all designed to maximize space and improve organization in different areas of the home. It also features products from small businesses such as Tub Cubby, Elypro, Homelux Theory, DomeDock, SpaceAid, Lirex, and The Roll Keeper.

articles.title: Samsung's 2025 TVs Get All the AI Extras Nobody Asked For
articles.author: David Katzmaier
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing new AI features in its 2025 TV lineup, showcased at CES 2025. These features, beyond picture quality enhancements, include convenience-related AI capabilities. One notable feature is 'Click to Search,' which identifies on-screen elements like actors, locations, and products, providing real-time information.

articles.title: Samsung unveils plans to turn TVs into AI assistants
articles.author: Martyn Landi
articles.summary: Samsung is launching Samsung Vision AI, a suite of artificial intelligence-powered features for its televisions, transforming them into 'intelligent partners' with personalized viewing experiences and home security functions. The company is also introducing an AI-powered beauty mirror that scans faces and recommends cosmetic products based on skin analysis.

articles.title: Maruti Dzire Sees Strong Demand with 20,000 Bookings, Know Features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki launched the new Dzire in November 2024, which has quickly gained popularity with over 20,000 bookings. The sedan is available in four variants and seven colors, offering a 1.2-liter petrol engine with CNG variant options. The Dzire has a starting price of Rs 6.79 lakh (ex-showroom) and has earned a 5-star Global NCAP safety rating.

articles.title: (CES 2025) Samsung Electronics unveils new AI-powered QLED TV
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled a new high-end product on Sunday in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Ingenious Solution To Losing Your TV Remote
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing a new feature that allows users to control Samsung TVs with hand gestures using a compatible Samsung Galaxy Watch. This functionality will initially be available on 2025 TV models and Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 onwards and is expected to arrive on earlier TVs later.

articles.title: Bosch's AI-enabled bassinet tracks everything you'd ever want to know about your baby's sleep
articles.author: Karissa Bell
articles.summary: Bosch unveiled the Revol, an AI-enabled bassinet, at CES 2025. The Revol uses sensors to monitor a baby's heart rate, respiration, temperature, humidity, and air quality, providing data to caregivers through an app. Bosch plans to launch the Revol in China first, with a US launch targeted for 2026, and hopes to price it around $1200, with add-ons available.

articles.title: BYD to Officially Launch Xia MPV on Jan 8
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: BYD will launch its new plug-in hybrid MPV, the Xia, on January 8th at the Beijing National Aquatics Center. Pre-orders for the Xia, which features BYD's fifth-generation DM hybrid technology and targets the premium MPV segment, opened on September 27 and generated considerable buzz.

articles.title: (CES 2025) LG Electronics unveils new AI-powered OLED TV
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics unveiled a new artificial intelligence processor. The unveiling occurred on Sunday in Las Vegas.

articles.title: 36 Home Products For Those Problems That Seem To Appear Out Of Thin Air
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of cleaning and home improvement products available on Amazon. WD-40 pen designed with a precision tip, dishwasher cleaning tablets and fabric defuser are some of the new product introductions in the list. Other products include Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, and Rust-removing spray.

articles.title: LG Electronics unveils vision for affectionate AI at CES 2025
articles.author: yonhap
articles.summary: LG Electronics showcased its vision at CES 2025, introducing AI-powered innovations like the LG ThinQ ON platform for smart home control and the Mobility Experience (MX) platform. The company also unveiled new office solutions, including the LG Gram laptop, LG MyView smart monitor, and LG CreateBoard.

articles.title: MAMMOTION Unveils Next-Generation Robotic Mowers with New AI Vision Technology at CES 2025
articles.author: Redazione Adnkronos
articles.summary: MAMMOTION introduced the UltraSense AI Vision system and launched two new product lines: the LUBA mini AWD Series and YUKA mini Series. The LUBA 2 AWD Series and YUKA Series have also undergone functional upgrades. Pre-orders for the 2025 lineups are available from January 5, 2025.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 to Feature IP68/69 Water and Dust Protection Globally
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13 globally on January 7th. It boasts a dual IP68/IP69 rating for enhanced durability, a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a variable refresh rate, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The phone features a triple-camera system with 50MP sensors and a large 6000mAh battery with fast charging capabilities.

articles.title: This robot vacuum has legs
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Dreame launched the X50 Ultra robot vacuum. This new robot vacuum features two small legs, enabling it to navigate steps up to 6 cm in height.

articles.title: Silk Ads Tap into Musical Comedy Stylings of TikTok Star Carter Vail
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: A TikTok star debuts as a brand endorser for Danone's Silk, suggesting a potential collaboration for marketing or promoting the Silk product.

articles.title: Tidalove Launches Revolutionary Solid Serum on The Grommet, Redefining Sustainable Skincare
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Tidalove, a beauty brand, is launching its skincare products on The Grommet, an online platform for unique products. This launch signifies a key step in Tidalove's mission.

articles.title: A New Robot Mower at CES 2025 Can Do Something No Other Rival Can
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Lymow has launched a new robot mower featuring tank wheels. This mower aims to automate outdoor tasks.

articles.title: CES 2025: North Carolina startup looks to revolutionize mobile gaming
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: An Apex startup will debut a new product at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. The startup is focused on changing smartphone handling.

articles.title: We Spent Hours Watching a Robot Vacuum Pick Up Socks. It's a Dream Come True
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roborock is debuting its new Saros Z70 robot vacuum at CES. The Saros Z70 is designed for automated cleaning tasks.

articles.title: LG UNVEILS A DAY IN A LIFE WITH "AFFECTIONATE INTELLIGENCE" AT LG WORLD PREMIERE
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics unveiled its vision for AI-powered customer experiences at the LG World Premiere event in Las Vegas. This vision is themed "Life's Good 24/7 with Affectionate Intelligence" and was revealed on the eve of CES 2025.

articles.title: SwitchBot is bringing a Rosie the Robot wannabe to CES
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: SwitchBot introduced a new multitasking robot that integrates vacuuming functionality with an adaptable platform designed to support various gadgets. This robot can purify the air upon entry into a room. It represents SwitchBot's effort to create a robot similar to Rosie the Robot.

articles.title: Vacuum cleaner's robotic arm picks up your dirty socks and tissues
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: Roborock is introducing a new robot vacuum cleaner at CES 2025. This cleaner features a foldable arm that extends to automatically pick up items.

articles.title: Samsung's AI Robot Ball With a Projector Is Real and Ready to Roll in 2025
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Ballie, a robotic smart home ball, is now a real product after its initial reveal last year. It will be available for consumers soon.

articles.title: Samsung Stuns CES 2025 With An Eye-Popping Stretchable Screen
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Samsung demonstrated a new stretchable screen that can bulge out of a flat surface. This unveiling highlights Samsung's OLED breakthroughs.

articles.title: Tackle Wellness Goals by Adding a Touch of Green: Better-for-you recipes inspired by savory salad kits
articles.summary: Fresh Express is offering the Twisted Creamy Truffle Caesar Chopped Salad Kit, inspired by high-end dining experiences, which includes ingredients like brioche croutons, romaine lettuce, truffle Parmesan, and creamy dressing. Fresh Express also promotes its Sweet & Crunchy Salad Blend for recipes like Grilled Zucchini Nachos, aiming to provide healthier meal and snack options.
